name: SuperLightShoot
description:
A game I made for the "Weekly Game Jam 144 - In the Dark".

Heavily inspired by some of Metroid Prime mechanics, SuperLightShoot was the opportunity to see how I could replicate a basic Charge Beam and a simple radar. In the process, I learnt few things about lights, particle systems, navmeshes and other interesting stuff.

Also, my first game published on itch.io. 

Thanks for checking this out!
